author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Update the HLT common customisations to discover the `EDProducer`s nested within a `SwitchProducer`.

#### PR validation:

HLT customisations now apply the required changes also to nested `EDProducer`s.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport #33137 .
title: Update HLT common customisations to handle SwitchProducers
